YoTr2016-0.name: Yogācāra Triptych
description: A series of three original artworks on the subject of Yogācāra

YoTr2016-1.name: The imagination of the unreal
YoTr2016-1.medium: acrylic, aluminum mesh, and papier-mâché on wood panel
description: Yogācāra Triptych #1: The imagination of the unreal, 2016,
acrylic, aluminum mesh, and papier-mâché on wood panel,

YoTr2016-2.name: The dependence on flowing conditions
description: Yogācāra Triptych #2: The dependence on flowing conditions,

YoTr2016-3.name: The external non-existence of what appears in the way it appears
YoTr2016-3.medium: acrylic and vanilla extract on canvas board
description: Yogācāra Triptych #3: The external non-existence of what
appears in the way it appears, 2016, acrylic and vanilla
